replies.bodyText: Fyi this is a map, not some sort of guava loading cache. I don't know why but they apparently probably wants it.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure what "static context" means here. Maybe clarify a bit more with a longer sentence?
timeline.author: Earthcomputer
timeline.diffHunk:
